short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ✈️ Unlock the Best Value for Your British Airways Reward Flights!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop overpaying for your reward redemptions! British Airways offers multiple pricing options, but finding the best value can be cumbersome. Our extension helps you discover the most cost-effective option every time you book a reward flight. 

💰 Save Money: Quickly find the cheapest reward flight pricing option.
🧐 Custom Avios Values: Choose your own Avios value, or use one of our commonly selected values.

💱 Supported Currencies:
🇬🇧 GBP
🇪🇺 EUR
🇺🇸 USD
🇦🇺 AUD
🇨🇿 CZK
🇮🇩 IDR

If your currency isn't supported yet, feel free to email me a request!
